questions.question: Which of the following are considered microbes?
What percentage of the total number of cells in your body are microbes?
If we told you that microbes live on your skin, and that every human has a different set of microbes, which of the following factors do you think might influence these differences?
answers: how often you clean your house
where you live (e.g. in a city, on a farm, etc.)
none of these factors matter; it is completely random

questions.question: If we told you that microbes are on most of your household items, which of the following TWO items would have the most similar kinds of microbes on them? Please select TWO items!
What do you think microbes do on your skin?
What do you think the impact of bacterial diversity in your digestive tract and on yourskin might be?
Do you take probiotics?
answers: I don't know what a probiotic is

questions.question: What are your thoughts on the following statement: We should be more informed about our use and potential overuse of antibiotics.
answers: I agree and am fully aware of the importance of this statement.
Knowing more about this would influence my behavior.
This does not interest me personally.
I disagree with this statement entirely.

questions.question: What is your attitude toward the fact that there are microbes all over and in your body? (check as many as are true for you)
What are your thoughts on the following statement: Microbes are essential to my good health.
answers: I disagree with this statement entirely.
I agree and am fully aware of the importance of this statement.
Knowing more about this would influence my behavior
This does not interest me personally

questions.question: What are your thoughts on the following statement: A diverse ecosystem of microbes in and on your body is beneficial to my health.
answers: This does not interest me personally
Knowing more about this would influence my behavior
I disagree with this statement entirely.
I agree and am fully aware of the importance of this statement.
